headerSection.title: A graph is worth a thousand words

bulletPoints.title: Customizable
bulletPoints.text: Make the charts your own. Configure an extensive set of options to perfectly match the look and feel of your data.

bulletPoints.title: Rich Gallery
bulletPoints.text: Choose from a variety of charts. From simple scatter plots to hierarchical treemaps, find the best fit for your data.

bulletPoints.title: Dynamic Data
bulletPoints.text: Easily connect charts and controls with an interactive dashboard. Connect to your data in real time using a variety of tools.

insights.title: Novelty
insights.description: More than 34 charts are available - All customizable at your convenience.

insights.title: Customization
insights.description: Customize your graphics to your wishes: plots, texts, axes and legends but also the possibility to combine several graphs while inserting configurable buttons.

insights.title: Modernization
insights.description: Make better use of your data with the new CC1C Graphs generation. The new generation offers vector, surface, three-dimensional graphics and much more.

insights.title: Information
insights.description: Schematize your ideas as they develop while keeping them as clear and precise as possible.

insights.title: Revolution
insights.description: Illustrate your data in your presentations, reports and more generally in your professional and personal life with specific and detailed graphs. No longer be limited by the software but by your ideas.

panelsList.title: How do I insert an instance of the graphic editor in my spreadsheet ?
panelsList.text: To insert a graphic editor instance : "Insert" tab > "My Add-ins" > Select the add-in > "Add".

panelsList.title: Can we insert more than one graphic editor instance ?
panelsList.text: Yes, it is possible to insert several graphic editor instance. You simply have to repeat the same process explained above.

panelsList.title: How to select cells, how do I use my spreadsheet's data ?
panelsList.text: You only have to write the range address of your data to make it available within the editor (e.g: "Sheet1!F14:F27" or "A14:F14"). Only 1D rows and columns of dimension can be selected.

panelsList.title: I would like to have a new feature integrated, what should I do ?
panelsList.text: We are listening to your suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us by email at support@cc-1c.com.

panelsList.title: Under the hood
panelsList.text:
- A button to select the spreadsheet cells more easily will be added to the editor
 - An example will be available for each graph type
 - We will add the possibility to toggle the controls panel

panelsList.title: New graphics
panelsList.text: Other diverse and varied graphics will be implemented.

panelsList.title: 3D Graphs - Streamtube
panelsList.text: The following parameters have been disabled for the moment : Xstart, Ystart and Zstart.

description.start: What are you waiting for to

bulletPoints.title: Efficiency
bulletPoints.text: Solve your problems automatically, to make them less time-consuming and energy-consuming

bulletPoints.title: Visualization
bulletPoints.text: Visualize the functions in mathematical form, for your reports and for a better understanding

bulletPoints.title: Learning
bulletPoints.text: Learn with the CC1C Solvers Calculation Methodology Display

insights.title: Novelty
insights.description: More than 15 functions are available - All of them can be viewed in the Display panel.

insights.title: Features
insights.description: Choose the format of your results, CC1C Solvers returns exact or approximate results, in the real or imaginary domain.

insights.title: Visualize
insights.description: Visualize in a mathematical format, thanks to the Display panel, all the functions proposed by the CC1C solvers complement. You will be able to better apprehend all the data analysis.

insights.title: Learn
insights.description: Learn through the precise calculation methodology of the "CC1C display" panel, like a schoolyard, and working for all expressions. Functionality available for various functions such as derivatives and integrals.

panelsList.title: How to use the CC1C functions ?
panelsList.text: By clicking on the "Tutorial" button in the CC1C Solvers tab, we invite you to download the spreadsheets explaining precisely how to use each function.

panelsList.title: I have an error with a function, what should I do ?
panelsList.text: If you cannot find the solution with the Tutorial workbook, you can contact us by email at support@cc-1c.com.

panelsList.title: I would like to have a new feature integrated, what should I do ?
panelsList.text: We are listening to your suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us by email at support@cc-1c.com.

panelsList.title: Under the hood
panelsList.text:
- Take into account the notations of the different countries for the separation of the decimal part "," and the "."
 - Choose the number of significant digits for the complex/formal format (2 by default).
 - Use Excel format for complex expressions. We invite you to download the tutorial on complex numbers, where we give you an example to translate from CC1C format to Excel format.
 - We keep the rest as a surprise !

panelsList.title: New functions
panelsList.text: A very wide range of new functions will be implemented soon. Stay tuned.

panelsList.title: Display panel features
panelsList.text:
- Update the Display input in real time in relation to the selected cell.
 - Standardization of display functions and functions to be typed in cells.

panelsList.title: Display panel issues
panelsList.text:
- There is a minor display problem with the `solve_pol_system()` function 
 - The screenshots exported from the display to Excel have a grey background
 - The Display panel does not recognize the following functions :  "asech" ; "acsch" ; "sech"; "csch"; "asec" ; "acsc" ; "atan2"
